verses.verse: The preparations <S%H4633><s%> of the heart <S%H3820><s%> in man <S%H120><s%>, and the answer <S%H4617><s%> of the tongue <S%H3956><s%>, is from the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. preparations: or, disposings
All the ways <S%H1870><s%> of a man <S%H376><s%> are clean <S%H2134><s%> in his own eyes <S%H5869><s%>; but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> weigheth <S%H8505><s%> the spirits <S%H7307><s%>.
Commit <S%H1556><s%> thy works <S%H4639><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and thy thoughts <S%H4284><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%>. Commit: Heb. Roll
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath made <S%H6466><s%> all things for himself <S%H4617><s%>: yea, even the wicked <S%H7563><s%> for the day <S%H3117><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%>.

Every one that is proud <S%H1362><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: though hand <S%H3027><s%> join in hand <S%H3027><s%>, he shall not be unpunished <S%H5352><s%>. unpunished: Heb. held innocent
By mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> is purged <S%H3722><s%>: and by the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> men depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%>.
When a man's <S%H376><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%> please <S%H7521><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, he maketh even his enemies <S%H341><s%> to be at peace <S%H7999><s%> with him.
Better <S%H2896><s%> is a little <S%H4592><s%> with righteousness <S%H6666><s%> than great <S%H7230><s%> revenues <S%H8393><s%> without right <S%H4941><s%>.
A man's <S%H120><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> deviseth <S%H2803><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%>: but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> directeth <S%H3559><s%> his steps <S%H6806><s%>.
A divine sentence <S%H7081><s%> is in the lips <S%H8193><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>: his mouth <S%H6310><s%> transgresseth <S%H4603><s%> not in judgment <S%H4941><s%>. A divine: Heb. Divination

A just <S%H4941><s%> weight <S%H6425><s%> and balance <S%H3976><s%> are the LORD'S <S%H3068><s%>: all the weights <S%H68><s%> of the bag <S%H3599><s%> are his work <S%H4639><s%>. the weights: Heb. the stones
It is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to kings <S%H4428><s%> to commit <S%H6213><s%> wickedness <S%H7562><s%>: for the throne <S%H3678><s%> is established <S%H3559><s%> by righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.
Righteous <S%H6664><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> are the delight <S%H7522><s%> of kings <S%H4428><s%>; and they love <S%H157><s%> him that speaketh <S%H1696><s%> right <S%H3477><s%>.
The wrath <S%H2534><s%> of a king <S%H4428><s%> is as messengers <S%H4397><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>: but a wise <S%H2450><s%> man <S%H376><s%> will pacify <S%H3722><s%> it.
In the light <S%H216><s%> of the king's <S%H4428><s%> countenance <S%H6440><s%> is life <S%H2416><s%>; and his favour <S%H7522><s%> is as a cloud <S%H5645><s%> of the latter rain <S%H4456><s%>.

How much better <S%H2896><s%> is it to get <S%H7069><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> than gold <S%H2742><s%>! and to get <S%H7069><s%> understanding <S%H998><s%> rather to be chosen <S%H977><s%> than silver <S%H3701><s%>!

The highway <S%H4546><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> is to depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil <S%H7451><s%>: he that keepeth <S%H5341><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%> preserveth <S%H8104><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%>.
Pride <S%H1347><s%> goeth before <S%H6440><s%> destruction <S%H7667><s%>, and an haughty <S%H1363><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> a fall <S%H3783><s%>.

Better <S%H2896><s%> it is to be of an humble <S%H8217><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> with the lowly <S%H6035><s%> <S%H6041><s%>, than to divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> with the proud <S%H1343><s%>.

He that handleth a matter <S%H1697><s%> wisely <S%H7919><s%> shall find <S%H4672><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>: and whoso trusteth <S%H982><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, happy <S%H835><s%> is he. handleth: or, understandeth a matter

The wise <S%H2450><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> shall be called <S%H7121><s%> prudent <S%H995><s%>: and the sweetness <S%H4986><s%> of the lips <S%H8193><s%> increaseth <S%H3254><s%> learning <S%H3948><s%>.
Understanding <S%H7922><s%> is a wellspring <S%H4726><s%> of life <S%H2416><s%> unto him that hath <S%H1167><s%> it: but the instruction <S%H4148><s%> of fools <S%H191><s%> is folly <S%H200><s%>.
The heart <S%H3820><s%> of the wise <S%H2450><s%> teacheth <S%H7919><s%> his mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and addeth <S%H3254><s%> learning <S%H3948><s%> to his lips <S%H8193><s%>. teacheth: Heb. maketh wise
Pleasant <S%H5278><s%> words <S%H561><s%> are as an honeycomb <S%H6688><s%> <S%H1706><s%>, sweet <S%H4966><s%> to the soul <S%H5315><s%>, and health <S%H4832><s%> to the bones <S%H6106><s%>.
There is <S%H3426><s%> a way <S%H1870><s%> that seemeth right <S%H3477><s%> unto <S%H6440><s%> a man <S%H376><s%>, but the end <S%H319><s%> thereof are the ways <S%H1870><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>.

He <S%H5315><s%> that laboureth <S%H6001><s%> laboureth <S%H5998><s%> for himself; for his mouth <S%H6310><s%> craveth <S%H404><s%> it of him. He: Heb. The soul of him that craveth: Heb. boweth unto him
An ungodly <S%H1100><s%> man <S%H376><s%> diggeth up <S%H3738><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>: and in his lips <S%H8193><s%> there is as a burning <S%H6867><s%> fire <S%H784><s%>. An: Heb. A man of Belial
A froward <S%H8419><s%> man <S%H376><s%> soweth <S%H7971><s%> strife <S%H4066><s%>: and a whisperer <S%H5372><s%> separateth <S%H6504><s%> chief friends <S%H441><s%>. soweth: Heb. sendeth forth
A violent <S%H2555><s%> man <S%H376><s%> enticeth <S%H6601><s%> his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>, and leadeth <S%H3212><s%> him into the way <S%H1870><s%> that is not good <S%H2896><s%>.

He shutteth <S%H6095><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> to devise <S%H2803><s%> froward things <S%H8419><s%>: moving <S%H7169><s%> his lips <S%H8193><s%> he bringeth <S%H3615><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> to pass <S%H3615><s%>.
The hoary head <S%H7872><s%> is a crown <S%H5850><s%> of glory <S%H8597><s%>, if it be found <S%H4672><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

He that is slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than the mighty <S%H1368><s%>; and he that ruleth <S%H4910><s%> his spirit <S%H7307><s%> than he that taketh <S%H3920><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%>.
The lot <S%H1486><s%> is cast <S%H2904><s%> into the lap <S%H2436><s%>; but the whole disposing <S%H4941><s%> thereof is of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
